alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 12:54AM AKST until March 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with periods of low visibility expected. Brief freezing rain. Ice accumulation of a light glaze. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * WHEN...Through midnight AKST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue into Thursday night. Winds will increase on Thursday causing blowing and drifting snow with periods of low visibility on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
